articles.content: May 5 is internationally observed as World Asthma Day. Asthma, or wheezy chest, is a fairly common disease. In India, an estimated 15 to 20 million people have asthma. Asthma is a disease in which th… [+3638 chars]

articles.title: New research: In Covid survivors, single Pfizer dose boosts response against key strains - The Indian Express
articles.description: The findings looked at immune responses in UK healthcare workers at Barts and Royal Free hospitals following their first dose of the Pfizer/BioNTech vaccine.
articles.content: A single dose of vaccine boosts potent responses against SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus variants in those with previous Covid-19, a study has found. In those who have not previously been infected and have so… [+1967 chars]
